product_name: Nite Ize See'Ems Spoke Bike Light
long_description: The Nite Ize See'Ems spoke bike light mounts to most all types of bike wheel spokes to enhance your visibility when riding in low light. A bright LED is housed within a tough, weather-resistant shell; light is activated with an easy twist. Stainless-steel clips snap securely onto round, bladed and oval bicycle wheel spokes. LED is powered by a replaceable 927 3V lithium battery (included); run time of up to 24 hrs. Please note: comes in a package of 2 spoke bike lights.
short_description: The Nite Ize See'Ems spoke bike light mounts to most all types of bike wheel spokes to enhance your visibility when riding in low light.
